attributes.review: literally so bad. like all of the stuff he’s doing and saying is complete bs. i cant believe anyone would support someone like this- he could legit openly say the n word and bluntly say that he wants every poc to die and stay out of the country and his supporters would say “it was taken out of context.” i simply don’t understand how he’s “making america great again” when it’s never been great. 😐

attributes.review: Hate to break it to all you trump supporters, but Trump is a bigot, a racist, and a rapist, so if you support him, you support all those things. Hope you all realize what a horrible mistake you made electing him last term.

attributes.review:
This app was so horrible!🤬🤬😭🥵😡
While i was on my way 🚗🚗🚗🚗to go to my oompah loompas, when a smelly orange toe🦶🦶🦶🦶🤮🤮🤮🤮 had emerged from my phone👎👎😿😿📞📞📞!
Then i realized! 🙀🙀🙀🙀
It was President Trump!😲😲😲😑
He wouldn't leave my 📞📞📞phone! 👎😿😿😿👎👎
Until he had climbed out of my 📞📞📞phone! 
I said uh oh no, leave! 🖕🖕🖕👎
Instead he stole my microwave!💩💩💩💩
I then snatched his wig off his head! 
And flung it onto 🗻🗻🗻Mt. Everest! 
Good luck finding your wig ugly orange toe!☺️😃🧚‍♀️🐽🌚👹🤭🤗🤭
attributes.title: Oh My Goodness!

attributes.review: This app is literally making me puke of how horrible it is. The main orange of this app is not doing his job as a president. Please delete this app right now before gen z come for you. Thank you 🥳
attributes.title: Unbelievably gross 🦄
